author: luehe
msg: Small optimization of Mark's patch: Avoid repeated call to findErrorPage() if 'realError' and 'throwable' are identical ('realError' may be different from 'throwable' only if 'throwable' is an instance of ServletException)

author: luehe
msg: Fixed Bugzilla 28272 ("Deploy manager command should use context.xml
Added support for embedded META-INF/context.xml, as mentioned in
manager-howto.html. If present, META-INF/context.xml is used only if
neither "path" nor "config" params have been specified for the "deploy"

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 13924. The spec states if an error page declaration doesn't match the original exception
and the exception is an instance of ServletException then the exception should be unwrapped
and a second pass made of the error page declarations.

author: remm
msg: - Remove the hadcoding of the extension validator.
- I think all the JARs from the common and shared CLs should be added to it.
